data.title: Okoye, E.I. (1998), Government and Public Sector Accounting. An  Empirical Approach, Onitsha: Chamark Publishers. Co –author.
Okafor, K. and Okoye, EI. (1998), Principles and Practices of Financial  Accounting, Onitsha: Baset Printing and Publishing LTD.
Ndibe, N.B. and Okoye, E.I. (1998), Auditing and Investigation, Awka: Future Tech Publishers.
Okoye, E.I. and Ani, W. (2006), Annals of Government and Public Sector Accounting. Nimo: Rex Charles Publishers.
Okoye, E.I. and Okafor, K. (2004), Principles and Practice of Financial Accounts, Revised and Enlarged Edition; Nimo: Rex Charles Publishers.
Osisioma, B.C. and Okoye, E.I. (2004), Further Studies in Accountancy; Theory and Practice, Aba: Afri Tower Publishers.
Okoye, E.I. and Akamobi, N.L. (2013),  Contemporary Issues in Business and Agricultural Financing; Umunze: Annyco Publishers.
Okoye, E.I. and Ani, W. (2017), Annals of Government and public sector Accounting, 2nd ed, AwkA: SCOA Heritage Publishers.
Okoye, E.I.; Maimako, S.S; Jugu, Y.G. and Jat, R.B. (2017), Principles of Fraud Investigation and Forensic Accounting, Awka: SCOA Heritage Nig. LTD.
Nkamnebe, A.D.; Nnabuife, E. and Okoye, E.I. (2017), Management Sciences in the Nigeria’s Quest For Development. A Festschrift in Honour of Professor Pita Ejiofor, Awka: SCOA Heritage.
